mapper.select: SELECT id as id, schedule_id AS scheduleId, years AS years, date AS date, WEEK AS WEEK, date_type AS dateType, create_by AS createBy, create_time AS createTime, update_by AS updateBy, update_time AS updateTime FROM rostering WHERE date = #{timeParam}

SELECT id as id, schedule_id AS scheduleId, years AS years, date AS date, WEEK AS WEEK, date_type AS dateType, create_by AS createBy, create_time AS createTime, update_by AS updateBy, update_time AS updateTime FROM rostering WHERE schedule_id = #{scheduleId}

SELECT id AS id, main_id AS mainId, member_id AS memberId, schedule_id AS scheduleId, user_id AS userId, nick_name AS nickName, schedule_type AS scheduleType, create_time createTime FROM roster WHERE schedule_id = #{scheduleId} AND schedule_type = #{scheduleType}
mapper.insert: insert into rostering ( schedule_id, years, date, week, date_type, create_by, create_time ) VALUES ( #{scheduleId}, #{years}, #{date}, #{week}, #{dateType}, #{createBy}, #{createTime} )

insert into roster ( main_id, member_id, schedule_id, user_id, nick_name, schedule_type, create_time ) VALUES ( #{mainId}, #{memberId}, #{scheduleId}, #{userId}, #{nickName}, #{scheduleType}, #{createTime} )
